name: Jaime Enrique Aymara Reinoso
description: '''Jaime Enrique Aymara Reinoso''' ([[Quito]], June 24, 1968) is an [[Ecuador]]ian singer and actor of [[tecnocumbia]], tecnopaseíto [[Bachata (music)|bachata]], national music, [[pasillo]], pump [[Bolero]], {{Transliteration|ay|italic=no|guayno}} [[jukebox]] pop music [[merengue music|merengue]], pop-flamenco, [[cumbia]] pop [[ballad]]s, [[Salsa music|salsa]], [[vallenato]] [[reggaeton]] and [[waltz]]. The lyrics of their songs are based on true stories of people in their country is known as "The idol of Ecuador" and "The idol of Quinceañeras", besides being much in demand in Latin concerts performed abroad as it is known for Ecuadorian emigrants.
